snippet: Inspired by the booming market for young adult novels, a growing number of biographers and historians are retrofitting their works to make them palatable for younger readers.
abstract: Growing number of biographers and historians are retrofitting works to make them palatable for younger readers, inspired by booming market for young adult novels; prominent nonfiction writers are grappling with how to handle unsettling or controversial material in effort to win over impressionable new audience; slimmed-down and sanitized editions of nonfiction titles are fast becoming growing and lucrative niche.
lead_paragraph: Inspired by the booming market for young adult novels, a growing number of biographers and historians are retrofitting their works to make them palatable for younger readers.

headline.main: To Lure Young Readers, Nonfiction Writers Sanitize and Simplify
headline.print_headline: To Lure Young Readers, Nonfiction Writers Sanitize and Simplify
